item.title: John add a quote by John Shors
item.description: "A sibling would be the one person in the whole world who would be with you from birth until death. At every step, she or he would be there." -- John Shors

item.title: John add a quote by John Shors
item.description: "How can you say goodbye to someone who is a part of you?" -- John Shors

item.title: John add a quote by John Shors
item.description: "Loved ones are sometimes taken from us, either by death or other circumstances outside our control. Yes, we should lament their departure and yes, we should pray for them often. But we shouldn't dwell so deeply upon such vacancies that life itself becomes empty." -- John Shors

item.title: John add a quote by John Shors
item.description: "without you there is only me, and with you there is us." -- John Shors

item.title: John add a quote by John Shors
item.description: "Many fear death. But I do not. For I've tasted the oneness we call love. Death cannot steal it. Nor temper it. No, I'll take my love with me, wherever I travel. And it shall endure." -- John Shors

item.title: John add a quote by John Shors
item.description: "Musuh membiak seperti tikus. Kau injak mereka, kau racun mereka, kau bakar mereka, akan lebih banyak lagi yang muncul! Tidak ada bedanya apakah kau hidup pada masa perang atau damai, makmur atau kelaparan! Musuh selalu menyusun rencana di belakangmu. (Shah Jahan dalam Taj Mahal, Kisah Cinta Abadi)" -- John Shors

item.title: John add a quote by John Shors
item.description: "Never deny yourself love, my child. For to deny love is to deny God's greatest gift. And who are we to deny God?" -- John Shors

item.title: John add a quote by John Shors
item.description: "I wondered then why children played so in the river, but adults ceased to see it with the same eyes. Why couldn't we embrace such simple joys?" -- John Shors

item.title: John add a quote by John Shors
item.description: "They say all things end. But I say all things begin." -- John Shors

item.title: John add a quote by John Shors
item.description: "I'll treasure every day that I have with you. For I've known what life was like before you and..and since you, and as far as I'm concerned, these are two different lives. And one makes me so very much happier that the other." -- John Shors

item.title: John add a quote by John Shors
item.description: "Ultimately, my love saved me, for my love gave me strength. At night, when sleep was sunwilling to rescue me, I gritted my teeth and devoured my fondest memories." -- John Shors

item.title: John add a quote by John Shors
item.description: "Do the strong cry every night for a month? she asked softly. When they need to, I countered, clasping her hand. Women, Arjumand, women are taught that there's no strength in our tears. But why are one's tears powerless, if those tears lead to insight, or a sense of peace?" -- John Shors

item.title: John add a quote by John Shors
item.description: "I believe that people who find each other in this life will find each other in the next." -- John Shors

item.title: John add a quote by John Shors
item.description: "You shine...such a light on me." -- John Shors

item.title: John add a quote by John Shors
item.description: "A Reason? People always say that. But only pepole who haven't really suffered talk about reasons. Because that's so much eaiser to say than to hear. What's the reason that our patients die? That they'll never walk again? That we've treated children whose limbs have been blown off? For that matter what's the reason for this hideous war?" -- John Shors

item.title: John add a quote by John Shors
item.description: " I'm not trying to save the world, much of it is not worth saving." -- John Shors

item.title: John add a quote by John Shors
item.description: "...and when the twilight of that ride is finally upon us, we will look at the trail we have taken and at the signs of our passage. And though our tears will be many, we will know that great lives have been lived, and that our memories will forever bind us together." -- John Shors

item.title: John add a quote by John Shors
item.description: "The body can survive while the soul dies." -- John Shors
